verses.verse: Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voices<s%> and <S%H5414>cried,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3863>"Would<s%> that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3863>would<s%> that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness!<s%>

"And <S%H4100>why<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>bringing<s%> us into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>? Our <S%H802>wives<s%> and our <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H957>plunder;<s%> would it not be <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?"
So they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> "Let us <S%H5414>appoint<s%> a <S%H7218>leader<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> of those who had <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> their <S%H899>clothes;<s%>

and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out is an <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with us, then He will <S%H935>bring<s%> us into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to us – a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H389>"Only<s%> do not <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> for they shall be our <S%H3899>prey.<s%> Their <S%H6738>protection<s%> has been <S%H5493>removed<s%> from them, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with us; do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> them."

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones.<s%> Then the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5006>spurn<s%> Me? And <S%H575>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will they not <S%H539>believe<s%> in Me, despite <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6213>performed<s%> in their <S%H7130>midst<s%>?

"I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> them with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them, and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you into a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they."

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> of it, for by Thy <S%H3581>strength<s%> Thou didst <S%H5927>bring<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H7130>midst,<s%>

and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> [it] to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> art in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> for Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> art <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye,<s%> while Thy <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them; and Thou dost <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

"Now if Thou dost <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of Thy <S%H8088>fame<s%> will <S%H559>say,<s%>

<S%H4480>'Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>promised<s%> them by <S%H7650>oath,<s%> therefore He <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>'
"But <S%H6258>now,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> let the <S%H3581>power<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>great,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as Thou hast <S%H1696>declared,<s%> <S%H559><s%>

'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression;<s%> but He will by <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> [the guilty,] <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the fathers on the <S%H1>children<s%> to the <S%H1121>third<s%> and the <S%H8029>fourth<s%> [generations.]'

<S%H5545>"Pardon,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as Thou also hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2008>now.<s%>"
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H5545>pardoned<s%> [them] according to your <S%H1697>word;<s%>
but <S%H199>indeed,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Surely<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> who have <S%H7200>seen<s%> My <S%H9202>glory<s%> and My <S%H226>signs,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>performed<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> yet have <S%H5254>put<s%> Me to the <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> and have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to My <S%H6963>voice,<s%>

shall by <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H518>means<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their fathers, <S%H1>nor<s%> shall <S%H3808>any<s%> of those who <S%H3605>spurned<s%> Me <S%H5006>see<s%> it.

"But My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> he <S%H5973>has<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H312>different<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and has <S%H310>followed<s%> Me <S%H4390>fully,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H935>entered,<s%> and his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> shall <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of it.

"Now the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H6010>valleys;<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> and <S%H5265>set<s%> out to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> [shall I bear] with <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H9235>grumbling<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me? I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>complaints<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they are <S%H9235>making<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me.

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to them, 'As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>'just<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in My <S%H241>hearing,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will surely <S%H6213>do<s%> to you;

your <S%H6297>corpses<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, according to your <S%H3605>complete<s%> <S%H4557>number<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me.

<S%H518>'Surely<s%> you shall not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H7931>settle<s%> you, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>

'Your <S%H2945>children,<s%> however, <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>said<s%> would <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%> – I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them in, and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3988>rejected.<s%>
'But as for you, your <S%H6297>corpses<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

'And your <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>suffer<s%> [for] your <S%H2184>unfaithfulness,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H6297>corpses<s%> <S%H8552>lie<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

'According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for <S%H3117>every<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H5771>guilt<s%> a <S%H8141>year,<s%> [even] <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> My <S%H8569>opposition.<s%>

'I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> who are <S%H3259>gathered<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> Me. In <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they shall be <S%H8552>destroyed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>' "

As for the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> and who <S%H7725>returned<s%> and made <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H9235>grumble<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him by <S%H3318>bringing<s%> out a <S%H1681>bad<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%>

even those <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the very <S%H1681>bad<s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by a <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> <S%H2421>remained<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> out of <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

In the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> however, they <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H7218>ridge<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> we are; we have <S%H3588>indeed<s%> <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> but we will <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>promised.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> <S%H2088>then<s%> are you <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when it will not <S%H6743>succeed<s%>?
"Do not <S%H5927>go<s%> up, <S%H3808>lest<s%> you be <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is not <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

"For the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> will be <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of you, and you will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3588>inasmuch<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> as you have <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not be with you."

But they <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H9424>heedlessly<s%> to the <S%H7218>ridge<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H4185>left<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Then the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in that <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them and <S%H3807>beat<s%> them <S%H3807>down<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>
